As I have played this again and again it has developed into a full fledged addiction and while I'm down in the shitranks I'm definitely enjoying the game as well as spending money for no apparent reason besides the gambling addiction of mine.

Now what should you know before playing this game:
-> You get a lot of cultural variety depending on the server you play on.
-> EU is a dumpster fire of different languages, some represented are french, russian, polish and german.
-> If you have a gambling addiction this game will run your pockets harder than the IRS coming for your ass.
-> This game actually requires about 3 brain cells compared to the usual two that shooters require, some would even say 4 is the optimal number.
-> The game is incredibly fun if you play with like minded individuals, be it improving or having fun.
-> I recommend having at least one friend and buying the Prime Status Upgrade.

Please review the review so we can have a long chain of reviews reviewing reviews. 
Thumbs up

从小就玩CS系列，一直和CS一起共成长，这个竞技游戏带给我的一种认真的电子竞技精神，特别好，而且自己打包括看比赛，这款游戏有时上演的逆境翻盘真的太刺激太震撼，特别吸引我。

Sure. The game is amazing and with a long learning curve. You might be frustrated at first (sure thing you will), but with some patience and dedication, this game tends to be infinite and give you such a reward for playing well. Of course there are some problems (valve plz fix) like servers, some bugs, elo system, VAC being useless every once in a while and the lack of comunication from the developers, but still enjoy this game. I've been playing CS for 13 years now, from 1.6 to CSGO (skipped CSS), and even though is the same game (i mean, in formula), still brings me joy almost everytime i play.
At last, the game is great, try it out.

PS: play with friends. If you don't have any, make friends with your teammates. It gets so much better.
